law.catch_line: Grounds for disciplinary action -- Payment of fines in lieu of license suspension -- Retesting in certain cases.

text.section: The board may require retesting of any licensee upon proper showing of gross malpractice or incompetence on the part of each licensee.

law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 103, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 8, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 161, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 1. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 354, sec. 23. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 19, effective June 30, 1960.
